remarks: The probability that the first vote picked in a count is a B (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Nov-2016.)
statement:
ballotth.m $e |- M e. NN $.
ballotth.n $e |- N e. NN $.
ballotth.o $e |- O = { c e. ~P ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) | ( # ` c ) = M } $.
ballotth.p $e |- P = ( x e. ~P O |-> ( ( # ` x ) / ( # ` O ) ) ) $.
ballotlem2 $p |- ( P ` { c e. O | -. 1 e. c } ) = ( N / ( M + N ) ) $.
$d M c $.
$d N c $.
$d O c x $.
